titleInfo.title: Four treatises on pharmacopoeia, cookery and craft techniques

physicalDescription.extent: Codex; ff. i+209+i (plus five unfoliated leaves after ff. 11, 34, 208 and 217)

Material: Western laid paper, with watermark in the shape of a hand (see e.g. f. 67)Dimensions: 275 x 170 mm leaf [200 x 130 mm written]Foliation: British Museum foliation in pencilRuling: Misṭara; 31 lines per page; vertical spacing 16 lines per 10 cmScript: MaghribīInk: Brown ink, with rubricated headings and overlinings in redDecoration: NoneBinding: British Museum half-leather bindingCondition: Defective at beginning and end; tidemarks at head and tail, ff. 1-27, 100 and 188 mutilated and repaired; some iron-gall ink corrosion repairedMarginalia: Few by more than one handSeals: None

mods.abstract: Ṣināʿat al-yad(صناعة اليد, ff. 1r-67v, defective at beginning);Anonymous treatise on pharmacopoeia (ff 68r-100r, defective at beginning and end);Anonymous treatise on cookery (ff. 101r-204v, defective at end);Anonymous treatise on craft techniques (ff. 205r-217v, defective at end).
